title: Local SEO: Creating Location Pages for Higher Rankings! 🌍🚀

tactics.name: Location Page Hub + Cluster Structure
tactics.description: Create a central hub page listing all target locations and build individual pages for high-traffic areas to improve local rankings and traffic.
steps: Build a hub page listing all service areas
Develop detailed location pages for high-traffic locations
caveats: Prioritize high-traffic locations over low-volume ones
source_quotes: they've built out Pages for some of them but not all of them

tactics.name: Local Landmark Mentions
tactics.description: Boost local relevance by referencing specific landmarks or local businesses in location pages.
steps: Integrate them naturally into page content
example_locations: plumbing near Southern Oaks Golf Club
source_quotes: mentioning local landmarks... boost your local relevance

heuristics.name: Schema Markup for LocalBusiness
heuristics.condition: If a location page includes schema markup, it should boost rankings
source_quotes: this is optimized specifically for the city of Fort Worth

claims.statement: Mentioning local landmarks improves local relevance
source_quotes: mentioning local landmarks... boost your local relevance

claims.statement: Internal linking between location pages improves rankings

niche_patterns.description: Target specific geographic areas with service keywords to capture local search intent
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Combines service intent with location-based search queries
source_quotes: you're going to want to Target people in areas that aren't necessarily within the confines of your headquarters City
